summary: Moscow State University (MSU) is a top research university in Russia. It has a huge campus with many different schools and departments. MSU has a long history and is known for its excellent science and research. Lots of important people, like leaders and Nobel Prize winners, have studied or worked there. It's named after a famous Russian scientist, M.V. Lomonosov. MSU is one of the biggest and most respected universities in the country.
title: Moscow State University
